ygData.subject: If fire won't work I'll try something else.
ygData.msgSnippet: Megaton bit down on the missle causing it to explode. ROARRRRRRRR The great Dragon howled in pain as the heat scorched his mouth. You actually hurt me, I am

Megaton bit down on the missle causing it to explode. "ROARRRRRRRR" 
The great Dragon howled in pain as the heat scorched his mouth. "You 
actually hurt me, I am surprised." He opened his mouth again and spit 
a wave of water down at the retreating jet. a spray of water dripped 
from the side turning to ice before it hit the ground. 

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Alloran2@a... wrote:
> OOC: I know perfectly well that Necromancer's dragon mode is 
gigantic.  I'll 
> just have to use it to my advantage...
> 
> :::Starscream:::
> 
> ::Starscream sees Megaton flying right toward him.  Well, if this 
bot wanted 
> a dogfight, hed get it.  Starscream fires a missle into Megaton's 
mouth and 
> does a U-turn to escape from getting swallowed::
